channel.title: Projects on Matthew R. Hennefarth
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Matthew R. Hennefarth

item.title: Classical Protein Electric Field Topology (*CPET*)
item.description: Software used to compute the classical electric field from a protein structure (or structures) as well as sample the electric field topological data.

item.title: Protein Hybrid Discrete Dynamics/DFT (*phd3*)
item.description: Quantum Mechanical/Discrete Molecular Dynamics engine to provide rapid sampling of metalloenzymes. System Requirements TURBOMOLE Version 6.6 piDMD Openbabel Version 2.4.0 Chimera Version 1.6.0 or greater (1.15.0 or greater recommended) Python Version 3.6 or greater (3.8 or greater recommended) Python Package Dependencies When phd3 is installed via pip, the following packages will also be installed if not already present on your system. jinja2 sklearn propka numpy Version 1.20.0 or greater hdbscan scipy Version 1.

item.title: RAII-Thread
item.description: Header only file for a C++ RAII thread that joins upon destruction.
